name: Vrijraj Singh
bio: Vrijraj is a dedicated Full Stack Developer and a passionate advocate for community engagement. He actively contributes to the TechFerment community and holds the esteemed title of Google Developers Expert for Firebase and Web Technologies. With a wealth of experience, he has conducted over 300 talks and workshops, sharing his knowledge with various communities. Vrijraj's expertise lies in Web development, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, and UI/UX Design. He possesses a strong drive for learning new technologies and leveraging them to build innovative solutions. Alongside his professional endeavors, Vrijraj takes pleasure in mentoring individuals and nurturing communities. During his leisure time, he indulges in his love for food and enjoys watching YouTube videos.

name: Sayed Ali Alkamel
bio: Sayed Ali is a passionate mobile apps developer with over 6 years of experience building and publishing Mobile Apps. Sayed Ali has developed more than 10 apps in his career. One of these apps has more than 2.5 million downloads and an average rating of 4.6 out of 5 on the Play Store. Sayed Ali has spent the last two years working as a native android and IOS developer building ila bank app. Since 2018, Sayed Ali has been giving talks and workshops on Flutter and mentoring developers and entrepreneurs to utilize flutter benefits to achieve their business goals.

name: Mohammed Buallay
community_title: Google Developer Expert for Machine Learning
bio: Google Developers Expert in machine learning and deep learning

name: Merab Tato Kutalia
bio: Google Developers Expert for Android. Software Engineer specializing in Android. Tato maintains an active podcast about work ethics and career growth and writes tech blogs. He is a GDG organizer and speaker at international conferences (DroidCon, DevFest, OWASP). Community builder. Does 1:1 mentoring. Alongside his technological pursuits, he is an amateur cyclist and runner.

name: Kanan Suleymanli
bio: MSc Computational Engineering graduate. Very skillful in problem-solving, critical thinking, math, physics, data analysis, visualization, and supervised/unsupervised machine learning applications. My main research interest includes Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Scientific Machine Learning, and High-performance computing.

name: Tural Suleymani
bio: With a remarkable history of spearheading operational activities in web and desktop development using the Microsoft stack, I bring expertise in technologies such as ASP.NET/ASP.NET CORE, MVC, Web API, WCF, WPF, Microservices, Domain-Driven Design(DDD) and Blazor. I excel in designing and implementing microservices utilizing C#, ASP.NET Core, Docker, and Azure technologies.

name: Karim Karimov
bio: Expertise in mobile applications, distributed systems, and graph databases

name: Kadriyye Macit
community_title: Google Developer Expert for Flutter & Dart
bio: I am a software engineer and currently working as a senior Flutter developer in a Dutch company (remote). I have been developing Flutter for about 4.5 years. I like to share what I've learned so we can gain more perspectives. To bring this to life, I have a YouTube channel (Hello World) and a Medium account full of the Flutter contents where I share what I have learned. It is entertaining to produce contents, participate in the events and organizing the events in my free time so I am an organizer in Flutter Turkey and Flutter Ankara. I love connecting with other people and learning together new technologies. Therefore I am a Flutterista in Flutteristas Community and a Women TechMakers Ambassador in Google.

name: Tahreem Rasul
bio: M.Sc. Machine Learning in medical engineering, with a background in electrical engineering - 5+ years of experience working on academic and professional projects in the field of machine learning (deep learning (DL)), natural language processing (NLP), and computer vision, using time-series, image, and audio data - 1+ years of experience working as a medical physicist in the field of Radiotherapy Cancer Research - Disciplined, focused and articulate, demonstrating a history of working towards multidisciplinary projects in multidisciplinary fields The views expressed on this platform are my own and may not necessarily reflect the views of my company or any of its officials.

bio: I am eager to learn , curious and amenable to improvement and I am a Machine Learning and Data Science enthusiast. I write articles on Data science and artificial intelligence on Medium.
